hackathon-description-text: Welcome to our page for WiCS's second annual hackathon, Hack Night for Humanity! This event is open to all UVA students, grad and undergrad, who want to learn more about issues facing the UVA community as well as create interesting and exciting projects! Join us for a fun night of food, games, hacks, and much much more!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Donation to a charity of your choice
The team that disrupts the status quo with an innovative idea.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Rice Hall Information Technology Engineering Building, 85 Engineer's Way, Charlottesville, VA 22903, USA
hackathon-location-address: Rice Hall Information Technology Engineering Building, 85 Engineer's Way, Charlottesville, VA 22903, USA
hackathon-description-header: Join WiCS for our 2nd annual hackathon, Hack Night for Humanity! Hack Night for Humanity will offer all of the learning and fun of a hackathon in just one night!
